title: 85/417/ECSC: Commission Decision of 24 July 1985 approving 85/417/ECSC: Commission Decision of 24 July 1985 approving aids from the French Republic to the coal- mining industry aids from the French Republic to the coal-mining industry during 1984 (Only the French text is authentic) during 1984
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 24 July 1985
approving aids from the French Republic to the coal-mining industry during 1984
(Only the French text is authentic)
(85/417/ECSC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Government of the French Republic shall notify the Commission by 30 September 1985 of details of the aids granted pursuant to this Decision and in particular of the amounts paid and the manner in which they are apportioned.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 July 1985.
For the Commission
Nic MOSAR
Member of the Commission
